a1: The stopwatch displays time with centisecond (1/100 second) precision, using the browser high-resolution performance timer.
a2: Yes, click the Lap button while the stopwatch is running to record split times. Each lap shows both the total time and the difference from the previous lap.
q3: Will the stopwatch continue if I switch tabs?
a3: Yes, the stopwatch continues running in the background and shows the correct elapsed time when you return to the tab.
